sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WidgetTextFields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WidgetTextFields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WidgetTextFields = Class.create();
WidgetTextFields.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	process: function(table_name, current_table_name, indicator_id) {
		answer = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord("pa_indicators");
		gr.get(indicator_id);

		var domain = new SNC.PADomainUtils().getCurrentUserDomain();
		var x = SNC.PAUtils.getFieldNames(gr.getValue('cube'), domain);
		answer = JSON.parse(x);
		return answer;
	},
	type: 'WidgetTextFields'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-08-28 23:16:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3d80d0320b300300edf02bd237673ade</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WidgetTextFields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">97a305876da620100acb70b353433004</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3d80d0320b300300edf02bd237673ade</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-09-24 19:50:58</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>456</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
